Title: L'amerloque
Actors: Pauline Pinsolle, Juliet Dunn, Laure Killing
Plot: Mathilde, a snobbish and lonely Parisian teenager has a hard time getting used to Elsie, the lively African-American au pair girl her mother hired. Unexpectedly, a close friendship blossoms with this "Amerloque" (a pejorative word...
